segments.text: Good afternoon madam . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi . I want to check out . My room is 1005 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Please hold on a minute . So you checked in on Monday and stayed 3 nights in single room 1005 . Is that right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . Can I have a look at my bill ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Here you are . If there are no questions , could we have your signature in the blank below ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I would like to have my receipt report , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here it is . We are pleased to serve you here and we look forward to seeing you again . Wish you have a good day .
segments.speaker: S1
